name: Time Thief Time Recorder
desc: During your opponent's Battle Phase (Quick Effect): You can Tribute this card; the next time you would take battle damage from an opponent's attacking monster this turn, your opponent takes that battle damage instead. If a face-up Xyz Monster(s) you control leaves the field because of a card effect, while this card is in your GY: You can Special Summon this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use each effect of "Time Thief Time Recorder" once per turn.
